metadata.description: Official plugin marketplace for The Cat Toolkit - Vibecoding plugins for autonomous AI development.

plugins.name: bootstrap
plugins.description: Initializing and repairing the system itself. Includes meta-builder and plugin management skills.

plugins.name: execute
plugins.description: The execution engine - where file modifications happen. Includes director, worker, and architect personas.

plugins.name: guide
plugins.description: Prompt engineering as a guidance mechanism for steering agents.

plugins.name: persist
plugins.description: Making ephemeral context permanent through session state management. Includes scribe agent.

plugins.name: reason
plugins.description: Strategic thinking and analysis without action. Includes brainstorming and deep analysis skills.

plugins.name: verify
plugins.description: The immune system - verifying correctness of changes.
